Reviews.Title: phone/watch a little misleading
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: The watch is fine, but I thought it had Bluetooth capabilities, a sim card is required (a cell phone), therefore a Seperate service is required or switch existing number and instructions are in spanish not english (the introduction for the instructions is english), but once opened its spanish

Reviews.Title: AT&T; shows it as a stolen phone!
Reviews.Author: Betsy
Reviews.Content: Argh - worked for like 30 minutes and was really cool.  Then stopped working.  After a half hour on with AT&T; they said the IMEI is on the "blocklist" and shows as stolen so they won't activate it.Returning it tomorrow!

Reviews.Title: Chinese Crap
Reviews.Author: HM
Reviews.Content: It does work with  a US SIM card ? I wasted my money on it ! Cant find a phone that can fix it . Instructions were in Italian ? WTF ?

Reviews.Title: BLOWN AWAY
Reviews.Author: dishant
Reviews.Content: i had ordered this for just a little secondary phone. It does the job really nicely. It came in a nice box with a pillow and every thing so here are the pros- long battery life- built in speacker- camera- fm radio- social media ( sim card needed)Cons- need a micro sd card for storage

Reviews.Title: gd930
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: Use AT&T.; ..Go to radio Shack. 250 Minutes for 3 months 25 dollars. They will even put the Simms Chip in for you.. You'll see that it is extremely easy. But You have to get a Bluetooth headset.... Then you pair the watch and the Bluetooth and  yer all set.. You get the pairing directions with the Bluetooth. Make sure you get the "BLUEANT T3....The BloothTooth will  actually talk you through. Any other will make it diffacult  for pairing. The Bluetooth and the SmartWatch is a marrage.. Easy,EAsy, Pizzie, Pizzie!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Looking!
Reviews.Author: Gigi
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas.  He really loved it although our sprint cell phone service does not work with this. He wants to keep it although we don't know how we will get it working.  Does anyone have any ideas?

Reviews.Title: ALMOST NICE
Reviews.Author: ROBERTO
Reviews.Content: EVERYTHING WORK PERFECT AND BRANG NEW PRODUCT I LOVE IT NEXT TIME I WILL BUY SAME PRODUCT BECAUSE IS GOOD.

Reviews.Title: The User Guide is so YUCK.
Reviews.Author: John G. Derrickson
Reviews.Content: The User Guide is so YUCK. When is a user guide not a user guide? When it's translated from Chinese into English by a kindergarten student! Not even a picture naming the buttons. What a pity - this thing seems to have some good features - what a waste. With effort and much guessing, one can do the essentials. I actually like this phone watch - as a phone it works well - as a watch it works well. Although, I'd really like to use my own band, a Twist-O-Flex.

Reviews.Author: Service member
Reviews.Content: Great product! This product came on time and I like it very much. There are very few product I would recommed to buy ,and is priced fairly.

Reviews.Title: Something wonderful
Reviews.Author: Adrian Cruz
Reviews.Content: I rate it because is all that I was waittingI really like it because is something new and tecnologycI recomend it to everybody
